pkgmetadata.longdescription: Structural Reliability Analysis // Perform structural reliability analysis, including computation and simulation with system signatures, Samaniego (2007) doi:10.1007/978-0-387-71797-5, and survival signatures, Coolen and Coolen-Maturi (2013) doi:10.1007/978-3-642-30662-4_8. Additionally supports parametric and topological inference given system lifetime data, Aslett (2012) https://www.louisaslett.com/PhD_Thesis.pdf.
